name: The Secret of Disco Niflheim Part 1
name_original: The Secret of Disco Niflheim Part 1
description:
I made this for the Secret Santa game jam 2020. Unfortunately it took me too long to code all the point and click mechanics as I wanted to use them for further projects. So the game itself has only two rooms with sprites I already had.

So you know, look out for future games :)

The controlls are classical point&click. Left click to interact, right click to change mouse mode and click on the chest in the left corner to open/close the inventory.
